name: ObfuscateAssembly
description: Replaces assembly with its obfuscated version
author: Innofactor Sweden

inputs.name: assembly
inputs.label: Assembly
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to assembly file to obfuscate

inputs.name: level
inputs.label: Obfuscation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Level of assembly obfuscation from very light and not noticable to extreme. Obfuscation can came for a cost of size and preformance. Please consider use `Recommended` settings

options.0: Recommended — Minimal possible size with reasonably well scrambled code
options.1: Minimum — Symbols rename without scrambling the code
options.2: Normal — Symbols rename plus code scrambling
options.3: Aggresive — Makes source code decoding completely impossible

inputs.name: key
inputs.label: Sign assembly with strong key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to key file to sign assembly
